snippet: Activist investors claim that the T-Mobile USA deal shortchanges MetroPCS shareholders. The case about valuation may be reasonable, the authors say, but making one for independence is not.
abstract: Activist investors claim that the T-Mobile USA deal shortchanges MetroPCS shareholders. The case about valuation may be reasonable, the authors say, but making one for independence is not.

headline.main: Staying Independent Is Not Much of an Option for MetroPCS
